Description.Text:
Position Situated in a very convenient and central position, next to the winter skibus stop, near the Fondo Ski Center [cross-country skiing], and six hundred meters from the start of the Sellaronda and Giro dei 4 Passi cableway, our hotel in Canazei is the ideal starting point for hikers, skiers and mountain lovers alike.
Restaurant A relaxing bar area with an adjacent stube room [stove parlour], a large lounge and a modern chill-out room with a big screen. It also has two well-lit and well-finished restaurant halls.
Outside
Lobby
More Informations A ski and bicycle store room, a private car park and a limited number of covered parking spaces.
